balance-main.title: Select a network for USDT transfer

important.title: Important
important.1: We accept payments only in Tether (USDT).
important.2: Top up your balance to activate your subscription.
important.4: Sending any other coin or token to this address, except USDT, may result in loss of your funds.

5.first_part: To activate a subscription “{{ subscriptionName }}“ for {{ subscriptionTerm }}
5.second_part: {subscriptionTerm, plural, =1 {day} =2 {days} =3 {days} =4 {days} other {days}} you need to top up your balance for {{ subscriptionPrice }} USDT + add ~1 USDT to cover a network fee.

balance-main.video_tutorial: Video tutorial - how to buy a subscription
balance-main.specify_hash_or_number: Specify hash or a number of transaction

recommendation.title: Recommendations
recommendation.1: To lookup transaction number on Binance, follow this link (authorized):
recommendation.2: If you've sent USDT from another exchange specify in this field Transaction hash (TRC20 example): fcb36c36a53a445aeadb39a567d426d456fc7a408d43160befe6f75d2b0f8ba1
recommendation.3: You can also specify a transaction number (Internal transfer) - 43047269665, but don't confuse with your wallet - TMBt8SyQ6JuAoWxkZ8NKi9FjWQPXHHt2A3

1.title: Step 1
1.description: Open a Binance app on your phone and scan QR-code, by clicking an icon at the top right corner of the application's home page.

2.title: Step 2
2.description: Now you'll see a transaction confirmation window. Verify the payment amount and confirm the transaction. After that click “I have paid”.

validation_messages.min_length: Minimum length is {{ min }} {min, plural, =1 {symbol} other {symbols}}
